unnormalised: Organic farming's awesome! My dada ji, Kishan Lal from Haryana, swore by it. Remember that bumper crop in '98? No chemicals then. Plus, it's eco-friendly. Even now, at 17:00 hrs, the fields smell so fresh. Amul must be happy. Organic is the future, folks! Need more training like at IARI, maybe around 26/01/2024 or 12/05/2023? Jai Kisan!
normalised: Organic farming's awesome! My dada ji, Kishan Lal from Haryana, swore by it. Remember that bumper crop in ninety eight? No chemicals then. Plus, it's eco-friendly. Even now, at seventeen hundred hours, the fields smell so fresh. Amul must be happy. Organic is the future, folks! Need more training like at I A R I, maybe around twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four or twelfth may two thousand and twenty three? Jai Kisan!
